summary:
The U.S. Armed Forces protect America and are made up of six branches: Army, Marine Corps, Navy, Air Force, Space Force, and Coast Guard. Each has a unique role, like fighting on land (Army) or in space (Space Force). The president is the leader of these forces.

The U.S. military is one of the biggest and strongest in the world. It has lots of powerful weapons and technology. The government spends a huge amount of money on it each year. The military has bases all over the globe, and its navy and air force are the largest worldwide.
title: United States Armed Forces
